emergence.agents

Class MCTSAgent

  • java.lang.Object
    • core.player.AbstractPlayer
      • emergence.agents.MCTSAgent

  • public class MCTSAgent
extends core.player.AbstractPlayer
    MCTS agent (2nd controller). Uses MCTS-tree-search to build and search in a tree.
